doc.title: President Gong Ke Elected President-elect of WFEO
doc.snippet: 2017 World Federation of Engineering Organizations (WFEO) General Assembly was held in Rome, Italy from December 1st to 2nd. The delegation of China Association for Science and Technology (CAST, the Chinese member of WFEO) attended the assembly. As the candidate recommended by CAST, President of Nankai University Gong Ke has been elected President-elect of WFEO. This is also the first time that Chinese serves as the President-elect of the WFEO, which is also an important breakthrough for Chinese to hold the position in international organizations.
